name: The Joy of Creation: Halloween Edition
summary:
This is a FNaF Fan Game, FNaF is owned by Scott Cawthon.

The metal groans and shrieks, the flesh rips and breaks, the body on it's very last stand, but the desire of vengeance...stronger then ever before!
Now it's HIS turn


Free
The Joy of Creation: Halloween Edition
Version: 0.1.0 about 2 years ago
CONTROLS: WASD to move C to Crouch TAB to display objective Left Mouse Button to switch cameras Right Mouse Button to play sound F to bring up phone
Free
Lite Edition
Version: 0.1.0 about 2 years ago
Game without any wires on walls/floor. Should up the FPS by a lot.

This is a FNaF Fan Game, FNaF is owned by Scott Cawthon.

The metal groans and shrieks, the flesh rips and breaks, the body on it's very last stand, but the desire of vengeance...stronger then ever before!
Now it's HIS turn

FEATURES!

    Full Free Roam!

alt text

    Minor Voice Acting

    Custom Music (by Nathan Hanover)
    Custom Sounds!

WARNING!

You need a fairly decent computer to play the game!

Here are the specs:

    Desktop PC
    Windows 7 64-bit or later.
    Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
    NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
    4 GB RAM or more

CREDITS!

Nikson - Programmer, Level Designer, Sounds, Animatronic Editor, Developer.
Lucifersam01 - Animations
Nathan Hanover - OST
MrBreino - Writer
EverythingAnimations - Base Animatronic Model
Ry-Guy - Voice Actor.
